original: 用兵變化若神，多次抵禦蜀國北伐乃至滅蜀；年近耳順，尚能平定遼東公孫淵。威震龍椅...
text: The use of troops has changed like a god, and has repeatedly resisted the Northern Expedition of the Shu Kingdom and even the extinction of Shu; when the age is close to ears, it can still calm Gongsunyuan in Liaodong. Megatron Dragon Chair...
